name: unashamed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not ashamed; without hiding behaviour or opinions that other people might consider unacceptable: Afterwards he spent five minutes with the president, of whom he is an unashamed admirer. We then checked into the hotel for a weekend of unashamed luxury. Opposite
ashamed
